meanings.definition: To train or instruct (someone) in a particular skill or subject.
meanings.sent1: She coached her friend on how to ride a bike.
meanings.sent2: The soccer coach coached the team on passing techniques.
meanings.sent3: He coached his cat on how to catch a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl coached the young birds on flying safely.
meanings.sent5: The experienced chef coached the new cook on making pasta from scratch.

meanings.definition: To give advice or instruction to (someone) in order to help them improve.
meanings.sent1: The teacher coached the student on how to solve math problems.
meanings.sent2: The mentor coached the entrepreneur on business strategies.
meanings.sent3: She coached her plants on how to grow taller by giving them more sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The older brother coached his sibling on how to make friends at school.
meanings.sent5: The fitness trainer coached her client on proper workout form to prevent injuries.
